title: GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch, Space Saving, 2 in 1 Control , WiFi Smart Light Switch Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, Neutral Wire Required, Voice Control, Single-Pole(1 Pack)

product_information.Included Components: Smart Dual Dimmer Light Switches, Wallplate, 4 Wire Nuts, 2 Screws ,User Manual

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: SPACE-SAVING DUAL DIMMER - The Powerful tuya smart switch makes it possible to control two lights separately at the same time, double dimmer in one switch lets your home design more simple and graceful. With 7-level adjustable lightness , just softly slide your finger to touch the panel.

TIMER & SCHEDULE -The stacked switches set timer or countdown schedules to make your lights automatically turn on/ off while you're home or away. Get ready to have a smart home and create customized schedule to automatically turn on/off Christmas lights, any home lamps, electric etc.

VOICE & REMOTE CONTROL-Our tuya Dual smart light switch works with Alexa and Google Home Assistant, just speak a simple voice command to control your home devices.No Hub or subscription required. Also, you could control your home appliances via App directly from anywhere, even you travel outside.

FAMILY GROUP SHARE -Set a group for all smart devices, include this dimmer switch, and control them in one command. Share your wifi switch to all family members in a minute. Meanwhile, you all can create various scenes for get up, sleep and so on.

NOTE: Neutral, Live, Load Wires are Required to Dual Dimmer Power Switch. Without Load/ Neutral, Please DO NOT Purchase. The smart dimmer switch works in a single-pole setup only (Not 3-way). App Supported: Our APP, Smart life app.The distribution network needs to be carried out in a dark environment, which can be blocked by hands or other things
NEED YOUR ATTENTION - Supports up to 150W dimmable LED/CFL or 250W INC/HAL. But this smart dimmer switch cannot be used with a smart bulb.

customers_say: Customers find the smart switch easy to set up with quick wire installation and appreciate its functionality with Alexa and Google Home integration. The dimming capability receives positive feedback for adjusting light intensity, and customers like its elegant design that blends with home decor. Customers praise the voice control features and dual dimmer functionality. While some customers report seamless WiFi connectivity and reliable performance, others experience connection issues and find the product unreliable.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I recently installed the GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch and I’m really impressed with how well it works. The 2-in-1 control feature is awesome because I can easily adjust the lighting for two different areas with a single switch, which is a huge space-saver in my home. The WiFi connectivity is seamless, and I was able to set it up with my smart home system in no time using the app.The dimming feature is smooth, and it lets me adjust the light intensity just right, whether I want it bright for reading or dim for a cozy atmosphere. I love being able to control the lighting remotely through the app or with voice commands via Alexa or Google Assistant. It’s convenient, especially when I’m in bed or outside and want to turn the lights off without getting up.The switch itself has a sleek, modern design that blends well with my decor, and the installation was straightforward, even for someone who’s not super handy. I also appreciate how responsive it is—there's no lag when I adjust the lights.Overall, the GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch has definitely made my home smarter and more efficient. It’s a great option for anyone looking to add smart controls to their lighting system, and I highly recommend it!

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 stars**Perfect Smart Solution for Modern Homes!**
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐**Perfect Smart Solution for Modern Homes!**The SPACE-SAVING Dual Dimmer Switch is an absolute game-changer for anyone looking to streamline their home lighting system. This smart switch allows you to control two lights separately with ease, making your home design simple and elegant. The 7-level adjustable brightness is incredibly smooth and intuitive, letting you set the perfect ambiance with just a touch of your finger.One of the standout features is the timer and schedule function, which is a lifesaver for setting up automatic lighting routines. Whether you're home or away, you can have your lights turn on/off according to your personalized schedule. The voice and remote control capabilities through Alexa and Google Home Assistant are fantastic, providing seamless control without the need for a hub or subscription. The ability to manage everything via the app from anywhere is incredibly convenient, especially when traveling.Sharing control with family members is a breeze with the group share feature, and it’s wonderful to create various scenes for different times of the day. Just be sure to check that you have the required Neutral, Live, and Load wires, and remember it’s for single-pole setups only. Overall, this dual dimmer switch is a superb addition to any smart home, offering both functionality and style. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGHome Double Dimmer WiFi Switch has exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I recently upgraded my home lighting system with the GHome Double Dimmer WiFi Switch, and I am thoroughly impressed with its performance and features. This device has significantly enhanced the convenience and ambiance of my home, making it a standout addition to my smart home setup.Installation and SetupInstalling the GHome Double Dimmer WiFi Switch was a breeze. The package included clear, step-by-step instructions that made the process simple, even for someone with basic DIY skills. The switch connected to my existing WiFi network without any issues, and the entire setup was completed in about 30 minutes.Design and FunctionalityThe switch boasts a sleek and modern design that blends seamlessly with my home decor. The dual dimmer functionality is fantastic, allowing independent control of two different light sources from a single switch.App Integration and Voice ControlThe GHome app is intuitive and user-friendly, offering a range of features that enhance the overall user experience. I can easily dim the lights, set schedules, and create lighting scenes directly from my smartphone. Additionally, the switch integrates perfectly with both Alexa and Google Assistant. Voice commands work flawlessly, allowing hands-free control over my lighting setup.

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsWorks well once you get it set up.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: It is a nice dimmer that allows you to put two dimmers into a single switch box position. It seems to work well. I have only had it in operation for about one hour. It works easily with Alexa.However, It is difficult to set up in the Gosund app (have to do this for Alexa control). because the instructions are inaccurate and I have almost given up. There are no flashing lights when it goes into setup mode. I happened to go to the WiFi network list on my phone after doing the reset and found a GOSUND_<MacAddr> network and connected to it and it set up. They should really be clearer that this unit (the SW7) does not have any indication it is in setup mode. This is a documentation issue.

customer_reviews.review_title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDo not waste your time buying this.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The absolute worst switch that I ever owned. It worked for about 30 days, then it started flickering. Now it is uncontrollable. It turns on and off as it wishes, dimmer goes from minimum to maximum, and everywhere in between constantly.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsDual dimmer with app/alexa capabilties.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: dimmer works great and allows control via app and/or alexa.  Was fairly easy to install though the instructions aren't great.  Was able to connect to router fairly easy but as I said the instruction are lacking detail.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Dual Dimmer Switch and Space Saver
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The smart dimmer switch has a very nice design, allowing you to control two switches in one unit. The price is reasonable, comparable to a single dimmer switch. It functions very well, and I particularly like its design. Additionally, it integrates seamlessly with Alexa, making it easy to control with voice commands.This switch is great for my usage because I was able to run additional wires and control my ceiling set of lights with two controllers. I can have half of them on or dimmed, or have them all off or dimmed. I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
